lead_paragraph: Miami Dolphins receiver Chris Chambers, who was arrested early Saturday for driving while impaired, has had his case delayed until Aug. 15. Chambers did not attend a hearing yesterday in Mecklenburg County court in North Carolina. He was also cited for reckless driving and speeding.
